entry.title: The Future is Ahead of Us, Not Set in Stone
entry.summary:
Author: Zi_Xi_Zy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 93,427Chapters: 38/?Kudos: 470

Summary: In her final year of lycée, Marinette moves to Gotham for various reasons. Meanwhile, Damian Wayne, in his last year of high school, is ready to leave the Robin mantle behind and follow his own path away from his vigilante family.But as he steps away from one destiny, another reveals itself—one tied to the Miraculous, to the power of restoration, and to the girl who was never meant to wield the Ladybug Miraculous in the first place.When Marinette and Damian meet, it becomes undeniable: the roles they were forced into were never meant for them. She was born for the Black Cat. He was made for the Ladybug. And together, they must uncover the truth behind the Miraculous, the Order, and their own tangled legacies before it’s too late.

After defeating Shadow Moth, Marinette and Damian both watch over the Guardians who protect the Miraculous, and their first group of children whom they sent into the future. entry.title: Defenders of the Universe
entry.summary:
Author: aldanavroon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,464Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 83

Summary: In a universe where divine forces walk reborn among mortals, balance is everything—and it’s breaking. The ancient Order of Guardians has fallen. Chaos stirs. And four Souls, once meant to appear one at a time, have returned all at once.Creation. Destruction. Lie. Intuition.They’re not ready. They’re not trusted. And one of them looks a little too much like someone Batman once called his son.As legends rise and secrets unravel, the fate of the multiverse may rest on the shoulders of children—ones who carry the weight of gods.

entry.title: The Love I Need
entry.summary:
Author: reagan_29

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,308Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 24

Summary: Hey so i hope you enjoy this spinoff from the story “Shes sunshine, she’s grace, she’ll punch you in the face” by Brinxiethebear! this is just my spinoff of what happens after marinette comes back to paris and if this takes place in 2024/2025 and marinette is a competitive dancer! there will be angst when mentioning some akuma attacks (which some i made up) and there will be no smut as i don’t want to write that!please leave comments with tips on how to improve! Marinette is back in Paris but misses Gotham so much, But the part of Gotham she misses is The Wayne’s as they had become such a big part of her life in the past few weeks and she has grown to love them very quickly, While Marinette is back in Paris missing the Wayne’s, The Wayne’s (especially Damian) are also missing Marinette and are starting to plan a surprise visit for over Christmas break. Marinette has suppressed her feelings over her friends leaving her for Lila for a while now but now that they are all friends again she finds herself starting to break. Will she find herself spiraling or will a certain someone be able to help. *Re-named used to be “the aftermath of something new”*

entry.title: letters to lovers (and the aftermath of cherry wine)
entry.summary:
Author: whoscountinganyway

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 152,493Chapters: 39/?Kudos: 3,236

Summary: Marinette Dupain-Cheng and Damian Wayne-Al Ghul are pen-pals for three years, during that time, Marinette slowly but surely falls in love (and Damian falls with her). Damian has to heal from his childhood and Marinette is still changing from growing pains; they are leaving partners and friends and toxicity and gods behind them.**Warning: reading this may cause whiplash-inducing criterion shift.You will no longer view anger as mad or friends the same way. Your concepts of "childhood" and "the right thing" will forever be changed. You will not be able to change it back.The average species lasts four million years on earth. We've been around for 300,000 of those years, but our ancestors were born six million years ago. To live you must adapt; change. Are you changing? What does that say about you?Reading this may cause delusions. You might start seeing ghosts. Or get a therapist.

entry.title: Sketches & Sabres: The Art of Unexpected Rivalry
entry.summary:
Author: Jasmineose

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,795Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 125

Summary: "You sketched me mid-duel. That’s psychological warfare.”— Damian Wayne, 13, after losing a fencing match by one distracted heartbeat."It’s not my fault your face has dramatic lighting built in.”— Marinette Dupain-Cheng, artist, trouble magnet, professional eyebrow appreciator.“You made me look… like I was thinking. I don’t do that. I act.”— Damian, deeply offended by looking introspective.“To her, everyone has a good side—even the kid raised by assassins with a superiority complex.”— Kagami, dryly, while watching Twitter explode."She hesitated before waving. He hesitated before falling apart.”— Alya’s live-blog, sketchgate_thread_omg_FINALLY2.txt"I didn’t know declaring someone your artistic nemesis was a thing, but I support it.”— Jon Kent, peacemaker, fan of cookies and chaos.“This is the Olympics, not an anime rivalry arc!”— Marinette, yelling into the press chaos as Damian disappears into a dramatic exit.
